# PlayReply

> AI-powered review response platform for Google Play and iOS App Store

PlayReply helps mobile app developers and businesses automatically respond to user reviews using artificial intelligence, saving time while maintaining personalized, professional communication with users.

## What is PlayReply?

PlayReply is a SaaS platform that:
- Fetches reviews from Google Play Console and iOS App Store Connect
- Generates personalized AI responses using Claude AI
- Supports 5-tier tone customization based on star ratings (1-5 stars)
- Offers auto-approval rules for streamlined workflow
- Provides multi-language support with automatic language detection

## Key Features

- **AI-Powered Responses**: Generate contextually appropriate replies using advanced AI
- **Multi-Platform Support**: Works with both Google Play and iOS App Store
- **Customizable Tones**: Set different response tones for different star ratings
- **Auto-Reply**: Automatically send approved responses based on your rules
- **Dashboard Analytics**: Track review trends and response metrics
- **Team Collaboration**: Invite team members to manage reviews together

## Target Audience

- Mobile app developers
- App development agencies
- Product managers
- Customer support teams
- Indie developers
- Enterprise app teams

## Pricing

- **Free Plan**: 2 apps, 50 AI replies/month
- **Starter Plan**: 6 apps, 1,500 AI replies/month - $29/month
- **Pro Plan**: 20 apps, 10,000 AI replies/month - $99/month

## Links

- Homepage: https://playreply.com
- Login: https://playreply.com/login
- Sign Up: https://playreply.com/signup
- Privacy Policy: https://playreply.com/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://playreply.com/terms

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js and React
- Hosted on Vercel
- Uses Supabase for backend
- Integrates with Google Play Developer API
- Integrates with App Store Connect API
- AI powered by Anthropic Claude

## Contact

For support or inquiries, visit https://playreply.com
